channel.title: API on Documentation for Balerter
channel.description: Recent content in API on Documentation for Balerter

item.title: API
item.description: In the global section you can define listen address. By default 127.0.0.1:2000 API path /api/<API_VERSION>/<API_QUERY> Current API version v1 Models AlertInfo field type description name string alert name level int current alert level (error/warning/success) count int count current level checks after last level change updated_at datetime time of last level change. Format RFC3339 (YYYY-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZoffset) An example:
